RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 70. Maiden Special Weight Purse 24300. FOR MAIDENS, THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 123 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KNICKS STORY was a forward factor from the start along the inside, shifted out to the seven path at the top of the stretch, closed rapidly under left handed urging through the final stages and was along in time. MOTOWN COLLECTION away alertly, set a pressured pace into the stretch, drew clear before the furlong marker then couldn't handle the late charge of the winner and just missed hanging on. C C'S CLEAR CREEK bumped at the start, prompted the pace three wide into the stretch then was outfinished. LOCO allowed to settle, swung wide and passed tiring rivals in the six path. FINISTERE well placed, failed to respond. QUICK QUICK WHIT pressed the pace two wide into the stretch then gave way. TWELVE MINUS ONE had brief speed. PAPA D L was outrun. EL BANDIDO bumped at the start and was no threat.

ENTRY.NAME: Papa D L
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Finistere
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed, failed to respond,

ENTRY.NAME: Knicks Story
ENTRY.COMMENT: close inside, altered course 7path top lane, closed fast, in time

ENTRY.NAME: Loco
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, swung wide, passed tiring rivals,

ENTRY.NAME: Motown Collection
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pressured pace, cleared upper stretch, caught

ENTRY.NAME: El Bandido
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: C C's Clear Creek
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, pressed pace, 3 wide, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Quick Quick Whit
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, gave way lane

ENTRY.NAME: Twelve Minus One
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 78. Claiming Purse 17400. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE APRIL 28. Three Year Olds, 123 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 28 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $6,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: EL MARRO pressed the pace two wide the entire trip, dug in under left handed urging and proved best in a stretch long drive. OL' L B set a pressured pace inside the winner and finished second best under left handed urging. MANNFORD never far back, finished with good courage four then three wide under right handed pressure. ATTACK ANGLE with the second flight two wide, lacked the needed response. YOU'RE MY BOY BLUE close up early, dropped back on the turn, was bumped from his inside near the quarter pole causing his rider to lose his irons. MUCHO PRIMO failed to menace. JOES A ROCKIN had good early speed along the inside, stepped outward bumping YOU'RE MY BOY BLUE near the quarter pole then flattened out. THE STEWARDS POSTED THE INQUIRY SIGN BUT TOOK NO ACTION.

ENTRY.NAME: Joes a Rockin
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed, drifted out, bumped 1/4 pole, flattened out,

ENTRY.NAME: Mucho Primo
ENTRY.OWNER: Poe Racing Stable LLC and 8 and 3 Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Mannford
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, finished well, 4 wide, right handed urging,

ENTRY.NAME: Ol' L B
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace inside, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: You're My Boy Blue
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up, dropped back turn, bumped 1/4 pole, lost irons,

ENTRY.NAME: Attack Angle
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, 2 wide, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: El Marro
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, long drive, all out, left urging

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 84. Claiming Purse 17500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 123 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 30 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: R CARDINAL PRINCE broke in front, set all the pace while nicely rated and maintained his advantage under right handed urging. VAIL OF HONOR void of early speed, angled outside on the far turn, rallied determinedly in the middle of the racetrack and finished second best. ALEXIS N NIKO pressured the winner two wide around the clubhouse turn, dropped back a bit and shifted three wide, came on again on the far turn then was outfinished. CENTSOFWANDER unhurried early, improved position along the rail in the stretch. GRAND DEAL raced three wide through the first turn, moved up four wide on the far turn then failed to sustain that bid. TOYI offered a mild bid along the rail on the second turn then came up empty. POT COMMITTED was no factor. TOM'S SPIRIT was hung four wide through the first turn, pressured the winner two wide down the backstretch then was through after a half. THISPOINTINTIME settled widest and was outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Vail of Honor
ENTRY.COMMENT: void early speed, angled out 2turn, rallied mid track, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Toyi
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, inside, empty,

ENTRY.NAME: Centsofwander
ENTRY.OWNER: Fisher Teresa K and Fisher James
ENTRY.COMMENT: improved position rail

ENTRY.NAME: R Cardinal Prince
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, set pressured pace, nicely rated, held well,

ENTRY.NAME: Alexis N Niko
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 2w, dropped back, came again 3 wide far turn, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Grand Deal
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3 wide first turn, middle move 4 wide, failed to sustain bid,

ENTRY.NAME: Pot Committed
ENTRY.OWNER: R and P Racing Stables, LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Tom's Spirit
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4 wide first turn, pressed 2 wide, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Thispointintime
ENTRY.COMMENT: wide, outrun,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 74. Claiming Purse 17400. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE APRIL 28. Three Year Olds, 123 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 28 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $6,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HOPPY GILMORE stalked the pace through the turn, responded with a rapid move three wide under left handed urging to make the lead in upper stretch and drew off to win as much the best under confident handling. GOLDEN MONEY allowed to settle, rallied through the stretch four wide and finished clear for second. OAKEN was erratic at the start, trailed for a half, swung wide and found his best stride late five wide. TIDE RISING passed tiring rivals two wide. THE MAN CAN sped to the lead soon after the start, set the pace along the inside for nearly a half, kept momentum until mid stretch then weakened. OHIO MUNNY pressed the pace two wide into the turn, made the lead briefly nearing the quarter pole then came up empty in deep stretch. MURRY SPUR was no threat. MA MOO POWER was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: The Man Can
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pace, 1/4 pole, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Murry Spur
ENTRY.COMMENT: no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Hoppy Gilmore
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, quick move, 3 wide, left handed urging, much best

ENTRY.NAME: Oaken
ENTRY.COMMENT: erratic start, trailed, best stride late, 5 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Ohio Munny
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, led briefly 1/4pole, empty,

ENTRY.NAME: Ma Moo Power
ENTRY.COMMENT: through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Tide Rising
ENTRY.COMMENT: passed tiring rivals, 2 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Golden Money
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, late rally, 4 wide, clear second

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 5 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 59. Claiming Purse 12100. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 123 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 30 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KRISTIN made the lead a few strides out of the gate, set all the pace and maintained her advantage under mild right handed urging. CONSTITUTIONALIST chased the winner three wide and finished second best in the five path under left handed urging. BEAUTY IN MOTION pressed the early pace two wide, dropped inside on the turn and finished determinedly. SURPRISED GEM unhurried early, found her best stride late between horses. SOLDAT TEMPTATION saved ground and went evenly. BELLAVALENCIA with the second flight two wide, faded on the turn. THREE POINT KUZ fell over then fallen LITTLE FOUR near the half mile pole, suffered a catastrophic injury and was euthanized. LITTLE FOUR also suffered a catastrophic injury near the half mile pole, fell and was euthanized. THE STEWARDS POSTED THE INQUIRY SIGN BUT TOOK NO ACTION.

ENTRY.NAME: Soldat Temptation
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: dh-Three Point Kuz
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell over fallen rival 1/2pole

ENTRY.NAME: dh-Little Four
ENTRY.COMMENT: injured near 1/2pole, fell

ENTRY.NAME: Bellavalencia
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, 2 wide, faded turn

ENTRY.NAME: Kristin
ENTRY.COMMENT: quick lead, set pace, held well, mild urging

ENTRY.NAME: Surprised Gem
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, best stride late, between horses,

ENTRY.NAME: Beauty in Motion
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, angled in turn, finished well rail

ENTRY.NAME: Constitutionalist
ENTRY.OWNER: Siesta Thoroughbred Racing Rossi Gregg and Toporcer Greg
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, 3 wide, second best, 5path, left handed urging,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 6 1M Dirt CR: 62. Allowance Purse 35100. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 123 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 30 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Al lowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RED HEAD KID broke in front, set all the pace, turned back a strong bid from the runner up entering the stretch then drew off under mild left handed urging to win as much the best while being ridden out. SMOOCHER unhurried early, responded with a rapid moved three then two wide into the far turn, challenged the winner past the quarter pole then was no match while well clear for second. ANIMO ROBERTO saved ground and went evenly. DANES HEART had good early speed three wide and was through after a half. HEIDI'S SINATRA was always outrun. GIBBY MY CORN was never involved. LIL RICKYS JEWEL pressured the winner two wide for four and one half furlongs, stopped abruptly was eased at the top of the stretch, jogged to the wire and was walked off.

ENTRY.NAME: Red Head Kid
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, led throughout, repulsed bid 1/4p, much the best,

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Rick D. Terrell & Shelly L. Terrell

ENTRY.NAME: Lil Rickys Jewel
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 2w, stopped abruptly, eased, jogged to wire, walked off

ENTRY.NAME: Danes Heart
ENTRY.OWNER: McFadden Jr Joseph A and Fewster Melody K
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed 3 wide, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Gibby My Corn
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Animo Roberto
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside, evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Smoocher
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, 3-2wide, no match for winner,

ENTRY.NAME: Heidi's Sinatra
ENTRY.OWNER: Eyerman, Lee J. and Molumby, John
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 68. Allowance Purse 35100. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 123 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 30 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allo wances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KNOCK WOOD allowed to settle, rallied three wide through the far turn to make the lead at the top of the stretch then drew off under right handed urging to win going away. JEBIP trailed early, advanced steadily along the rail and finished second best. SPECIALIZED dueled for the early lead along the inside, gained a narrow advantage before a half, set a pressured pace to the top of the stretch, swerved at the furlong marker and was outfinished. LEROYISALAGNIAPPE battled for the early lead between horses two wide, was a sharp threat into the stretch then faded. RED COMET was no factor. A PRAYER FOR KIDS was outrun. OHIO STRONG contested the lead three then two wide into the stretch and was used up.

ENTRY.NAME: Knock Wood
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, rallied 3 wide far turn, drew off,right urging

ENTRY.NAME: Jebip
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed early, steady advance inside, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: A Prayer for Kids
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Specialized
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside, led swerved mid stretch, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Leroyisalagniappe
ENTRY.COMMENT: battled between horses, 2 wide, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: Red Comet
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Ohio Strong
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 3-2wide, stopped lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 8 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 42. Maiden Special Weight Purse 31800. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 122 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SALTMAKESHERSWEET broke in full stride to set all the pace, widened unto the stretch under left handed urging and won as much the best while taken in hand late. COMPUTE THIS never far back, rallied through the stretch four wide and finished second best. CURLIN PEARLS unhurried early, found her best stride late between rivals three wide. MISS SPRINGSTEEN saved ground and went evenly. DERBY DAY KISS stalked the pace three wide through the turn then faded. MS. DEBBIE ALAN was no factor. SPOOKY LITTLE GIRL bumped at the start, chased the winner two wide into the stretch then gave way readily. OPIE'S GIRL bumped at the start, flashed speed along the inside then stopped.

ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, brief speed, inside,

ENTRY.OWNER: Sheppell Peter J and Royer Family Stables LLC
